TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Lidaw, title = Lidaw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lidaw} }

S.FORM: alang Lidaw ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Ci'an go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 1,118 buwan, 2,835 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 32% kyan ku 899 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 68% kyan ku 1,936 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 29%, Truku 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Lidaw hya' ga bsilung. tay 'zil na Lidaw hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na Lidaw hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Lidaw hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Lidaw hya' ga Taracan. tay 'zil na Lidaw hya' ga Pukpuk. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Lidaw ga niya mki sko Karing Keng ato Ci'an go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 1,118 bowan, 2,835 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 32% kyan ko 899 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 68% kyan ko 1,936 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 29%, Troko 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ngasal psato tegami ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Lidaw hya' ga bsilong. tay 'zil na Lidaw hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyaho' na Lidaw hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Lidaw hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Lidaw hya' ga Taracan. tay 'zil na Lidaw hya' ga Pokpok. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
